meta.title: I Survived
meta.description: What is it like to face death and make it out alive? Based on the groundbreaking A&E television series, I Survived documents harrowing stories of human endurance. In their own words, survivors recall how they overcame unbelievable circumstances that changed their lives forever.
meta.subtitle: What is it like to face death and make it out alive? Based on the groundbreaking A&E television series, I Survived documents harrowing stories of human endurance. In their own words, survivors recall how they overcame unbelievable...

episodes.title: I Just Jumped
episodes.description:
Eight year old Midsi is on her way home from school, when a strange man abducts her on the street and holds her captive for days. Despite her attacker’s threats, Midsi makes a daring escape and saves herself from certain death.

Got hair color needs? Use MADISON REED! Get 10% off plus FREE SHIPPING on your first Color Kit with code "SURVIVED" at www.Madison-Reed.com 

Find help and resources at www.RAINN.org

episodes.title: The Same Smell, The Same Burn
episodes.description:
When Karli starts a new relationship with a man from her past, she has no idea that he has some violent enemies. Karli survives not one, but two acid attacks at the hands of complete strangers, and must find a way to rebuild her will to go on.

Find help and resources at www.RAINN.org

episodes.title: The Ninja in the Attic
episodes.description:
On a normal Friday morning, Ellen is at home alone when she is brutally attacked by a strange man in all black. Ellen’s attacker had been hiding in her home for days, waiting for the right moment to strike.

Find help and resources at www.RAINN.org

episodes.title: Everything Went to Slow Motion
episodes.description:
Kim and Nina set out on an early morning hike, when a man emerges from the wilderness armed with a knife. What should have been a fun day trip quickly turns into a fight for their lives. 

Find help and resources at www.RAINN.org

episodes.title: I Could Feel Myself Fading
episodes.description:
Kendra, a single mom, is one year into a new relationship with a Hollywood actor, when his jealous, controlling behavior forces her to end the relationship. Just when she thinks it's finally over, her ex shows up at her house, and this time he's armed.

Find help and resources at www.RAINN.org

episodes.title: I Just Saw Evil
episodes.description:
Maggie is just 15 years old when an attacker snatches her off the street during her early morning run. When police close in on him, the attacker gets desperate, and Maggie clings to life.

Find help and resources at www.RAINN.org

episodes.title: I Could Feel Snow All Around Me
episodes.description:
Teri’s ex-husband attacks her in a jealous rage and leaves her to die, jammed in a garbage can filled with snow. For 27 freezing hours Teri wills herself to stay alive for her children.

Find help and resources at www.RAINN.org

episodes.title: The One That Killed My Husband
episodes.description:
While Debbie is outside gardening, an unknown attacker hides in her home waiting for her to come inside. He abducts Debbie beginning a 5-day nightmare, during which Debbie will discover that she isn’t this man’s only victim.

episodes.title: The Hardest Twenty Yards I Have Ever Walked
episodes.description:
When Amanda, a school teacher, is carjacked and abducted by an escaped inmate, she quickly forms a game plan: play along and stay alive. In order to convince her abductor that they are friends and get out alive, she is forced to make decisions she never thought she would face.

episodes.title: It Looks Like Dynamite
episodes.description:
Michelle and her daughter Breea are home alone when three masked gunman burst through the door. The home invasion turns into a high stakes bank robbery, and Michelle's only hope of survival is to help her captors pull it off.

episodes.title: I Didn't Stop Running
episodes.description:
One phone call turned Karen’s seemingly happy marriage into a violent nightmare. A prisoner in her own home, Karen outsmarted her husband and escaped with her life twice. Today, she uses her experience for good, helping others survive and learn to heal.

Find help and resources at www.RAINN.org
